boardgame.description: Timeline: Inventions is a card game played using 55 cards. Each card depicts an invention on both sides, with the year in which that invention was created on only one side. Players take turns placing a card from their hand in a row on the table. After placing the card, the player reveals the date on it. If the card was placed correctly with the date in chronological order with all other cards on the table, the card stays in place; otherwise the card is removed from play and the player takes another card from the deck._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The first player to get rid of all his cards by placing them correctly wins. If multiple players go out in the same round, then everyone else is eliminated from play and each of those players are dealt one more card for another round of play. If only one player has no cards after a bonus round, he wins; otherwise play continues until a single player goes out._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Timeline: Inventions can be combined with any other title in the Timeline series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: New - In shrinkwrap 100% of all profit goes to support the work of UK Charity Green Corridor. RRP: £12.99 Green Corridor Price: £11.00

SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS:
PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 3 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: PayPal SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping cost. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange within 3 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization BEFORE returning the item. If you refuse delivery of an order, we will deduct the return shipping charge from your refund.

DRAGONLAND: $8.95 Asmodee Editions [ASM TIM01] SHIPPING Continental U.S. - FedEx: $12.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - USPS Priority Mail: TBD

Asmodee (ASMTIM01US) Guess the date of creation for dozens of inventions! Was the light bulb invented after or before glasses? With Timeline, learn the answer to this question and thousands of others by comparing your knowledge or hunches to historic reality. At the beginning of the game, players all get the same number of cards representing monuments, inventions, etc. At the back of each card is a date. To begin, one card is randomly drawn from those not given to players. This is placed in the middle of the table, date-side up and is the starting point of a chronological line which will slowly be built by players. The first player then chooses one of their cards. If the player thinks that the invention on their card came before that of the initial card, the player places their card to the left of the initial card. The player_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s card is then turned date-side up. If the player was right, it remains on the table. Otherwise, the card is discarded and a new one must be drawn to replace it. Play proceeds clockwise. The more cards which are correctly played, the harder it is to correctly place new ones! The first player to get rid of their cards wins.
Played a couple of times - complete and in excellent condition.
for Dogbreath Thank you!! Also includes: Portfolio Shipping for Timeline will be $9 There will be a separate shipping charge for Portfolio
